author: wn.com
title: PM Sheikh Hasina urges Sri Lankan HC to invest in SEZs (Bangladesh Awami League)
text: ( Source : Bangladesh Awami League ) Published on Wednesday, 14 October 2015 12:00 Hits: 3 Prime Minister Hasina today offered Sri Lanka to invest in any of the 22 Special Economic Zones (SEZs) to be set up in Bangladesh . The Prime Minister
